summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5501 for the improvement of that portion of the Alley in Block 6, Hunter's Lake Union Addition, lying between Wheeler Street and McGraw Street, from 4th Avenue North to Bigelow Avenue North; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 70286, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
